egi.home_page_description: The EGI CheckIn Service provides a secure web interface through which service operators can register their OpenID Connect and SAML based services.
egi.footer_description: Copyright ©2016-2022 | Check-in is an EGI service provided by GRNET, receiving funding from the EGI Foundation (EGI.eu) and the EGI-ACE project (Horizon 2020) under Grant number 101017567

contact_requirements.error: The Service must have Support contact information
The Service must have Security contact information
The Service must have Technical contact information
The Service must have Administrative contact information

token_endpoint_auth_method_title: Client Secret via symmetrically-signed JWT assertion
token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg_title: RSASSA-PSS using SHA-256 and MGF1 with SHA-256

website_url.description: Website URL for information about the service (This information will be shown in the Consent Page)

service_description.description: Human-readable text description, plain text format (max 1000 characters) (This information will be shown in the Consent Page)

client_id.tooltip: A unique string representing the registration information provided by the OAuth 2.0 client at the authorisation server.

scope.description:
OAuth scopes this client is allowed to request. See here for more information.
eduperson_entitlement_jwt scope is only supported in the development integration environment.

redirect_uris.description: URIs that the client can be redirected to. Different URI validation rules apply depending on the application type.

post_logout_redirect_uris.label: Post Logout Redirect URI(s)
post_logout_redirect_uris.description: URLs to request that the End-User's browser be redirected after a logout has been performed using the post_logout_redirect_uri parameter.

contacts.description: List of contacts for administrators of this service. (Technical and Support Contacts will be shown in the Consent Page)

policy_uri.description: URL for the Policy Statement of this service, will be displayed to the user. (This information will be shown in the Consent Page)

service_name.description: Human-readable application name. (This information will be shown in the Consent Page)

logo_uri.description: URL that points to a logo image. (Logo will be displayed in the Consent Page)

application_type.description: Kind of the application. Web Clients MUST only register URLs using the https scheme as redirect_uris; they MAY use the http scheme when using localhost as the hostname. Native Clients MUST only register redirect_uris using custom URI schemes or URLs using the http scheme with localhost as the hostname.

requested_attributes.description: List of SAML attributes this SAML service is allowed to receive. See here for more information

allow_introspection.description: Access to the Token Introspection endpoint is restricted to confidential clients.
allow_introspection.tooltip: This is a dynamic field based on Authorization Method selected for the token endpoint.

aup_uri.title: Link to Terms of Use
aup_uri.desc: Link to the Acceptable Use Policy / Terms of Use based on the WISE AUP Baseline template (This information will be shown in the Consent Page)
